Hi John

I’m Dora from Loctek. We just launched some exciting new Loctek monitor mounts. Very flexible and ergonomically functional! They are must-haves for those working intensively with computers. Developers like you are all interested in our products very much! Would you like to try them out? It’s free! All I request of you is your helping hand with a free share on your social networks (if you really like our products).

I highly recommend this Loctek dual arm desk monitor mount for you: http://goo.gl/pjXxOF and this Loctek single arm desk monitor arm: http://goo.gl/Ckrq5m Or you can choose any other Loctek product you interested on www.zosomart.com

Please send me your address and the product you like, if you are interested.

And please note the specifications of the mounts to make sure our mounts fit your monitors.
